chunks.text_preview: Buy Divido Shibo Urushi | Minase Watches | Handmade in Japan. Divido shibo urushi is powered with a high-quality Swiss movement and every dial is hand-made in Japan by Urushi Master Junichi Hakose.. ProductGroup. static_fields.name: Buy Divido Shibo Urushi | Minase Watches | Handmade in Japan
static_fields.description: Divido shibo urushi is powered with a high-quality Swiss movement and every dial is hand-made in Japan by Urushi Master Junichi Hakose.

hasVariant.name: Divido Shibo Urushi Rubber - Golden Flux
hasVariant.description: A tribute to Japan’s finest traditional crafts. With the shibo urushi technique, urushi laquer is mixed with paint and egg white. The viscous consistency allows the artist to play with the puddle-like color spots.
